title: Welcome to PicBit
entry: Sign In with your Social Network
slogan: Stay tuned on the activity of your friends in social networks
about_first: Deus is a work group who is mainly working with Google tecnologies, particularly those most innovative: GO! programming lenguage, web components Polymer, GoogleCloud (CloudSQL y Cloud Datastore), AppEngine or Google Analytics.
about_second: It arised as a platform to educate students in leading tecnologies, deal with investigation projects and, at the same time, give them a first contact with the work environment. Currently, it has several Final Dissertation and Practicum students working in differents areas.
